alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 1:23PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laramie County through 200 PM MDT... At 122 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gun Barrel to 6 miles west of Hillsdale to near Ranchettes. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Burns, Albin, Hillsdale, Gun Barrel, Carpenter and Ranchettes. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 367 and 396. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
